message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 9-3-2, translated into en
data:
The UNIDO quality assurance framework is followed to check data quality and consistency before the data dissemination.

UNIDO (2009), UNIDO Data Quality: A quality assurance framework for UNIDO statistical activities https://open.unido.org/api/documents/4814740/download/UNIDO-Publication-2009-4814740
